pkgmetadata.longdescription: # suitcase.mongo[![Build Status](https://img.shields.io/github/workflow/status/bluesky/suitcase-mongo/Unit%20Tests)](https://github.com/bluesky/suitcase-mongo/actions?query=workflow%3A%22Unit+Tests%22+branch%3Amaster)This is a suitcase subpackage for inserting bluesky documents into MongoDB. Itcontains two packages:* `suitcase.mongo_normalized` --- This creates a Mongo Collection for each bluesky document type and has 1:1 correspondence between bluesky documents and Mongo documents. This is the layout that has been used in production at NSLS-II for several years.* `suitcase.mongo_embedded` -- This is an experimental new layout under active development and benchmarking. It is not recommended for use in production yet.## Installation```pip install suitcase-mongo```
